p: There are three practical contributions of this study. First, this study validates that increasing fitnesser's social recognition and environmental ethics can not only raise their joy of purchase, perceived usefulness, subjective norm, and perceived behavior control but also improve their behavioral intention toward green eating. If manufacturers want to increase their sales on green eating, other than increase fitnesser's social recognition and environmental ethics, they have to enhance fitnesser's abovementioned four elements to change fitnesser's behavior intention to eat green.
